des: "This gingerbread latte syrup is super quick to make and has great authentic gingerbread flavor. To serve, add 2 to 3 tablespoons of the gingerbread syrup to 8 ounces of hot milk mixed with 2 ounces of hot espresso. Store in the fridge in an airtight container."
ins: Whisk agave, molasses, ginger, vanilla extract, cinnamon, cloves, and salt in a bowl until well-mixed, about 2 minutes.
